tsunami.title: Tsunami
tsunami.description: A tsunami is a series of ocean waves caused by a sudden displacement of water, often due to an underwater earthquake or a volcanic eruption.

earthquake.title: Earthquake
earthquake.description: An earthquake is a shaking of the ground caused by the movement of the Earth's tectonic plates, releasing a large amount of energy.

volcano.title: Volcano
volcano.description: A volcano is an opening in the Earth's crust through which lava, ash, and volcanic gases are emitted.

fire.title: Fire
fire.description: A fire is an uncontrolled combustion that can spread rapidly, causing property damage and posing risks to life.

tornado.title: Tornado
tornado.description: A tornado is a violently rotating column of air that extends from a thunderstorm to the ground, causing significant destruction.
